text: André Roussin (22 January 1911 – 3 November 1987) was a French playwright. He was born in Marseille, France. He was elected to the Académie française in 1973. L'Académie française His plays were made into movies such as The Little Hut and The Ostrich Has Two Eggs. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1987 deaths Category:French playwrights Category:People from Marseille
title: André Roussin
